rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0001
rows.name: Are you a band of Drivers and Blades?

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0002
rows.name:
You look pretty strong, but
I don't think you'd be suited
to being in my party.

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0003
rows.name:
Why not, you ask? Well, to
put it bluntly, you're
simply not up to the task.

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0004
rows.name:
Are you keeping your skills
up to scratch to make sure
you're ready for battle?

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0005
rows.name:
You have to think carefully about the
skills you want to train, and use your
experience from battling and questing.

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0006
rows.name:
And me? Well, I'm the cream
of the crop when it comes
to thieving skills.

rows.label: tlk70000121_01_msg0007
rows.name:
So I'm afraid we just
wouldn't be a good match.
